name: liv-format
description: Live Interactive Visual document format - JavaScript/TypeScript interfaces

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:js
scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build wasm/interactive-engine --target web --out-dir ../../js/wasm/interactive && wasm-pack build wasm/editor-engine --target web --out-dir ../../js/wasm/editor
scripts.build:js: cd js && npm install && tsc && webpack --mode production
scripts.build:go: go mod tidy && mkdir -p bin && go build -o bin/liv-cli ./cmd/cli && go build -o bin/liv-viewer ./cmd/viewer && go build -o bin/liv-builder ./cmd/builder
scripts.build:all: npm run build:go-safe && npm run build
scripts.start:desktop: cd desktop && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:viewer: echo 'Go viewer not available, starting desktop app instead' && npm run start:desktop
scripts.install:deps: npm run install:js && npm run install:desktop
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:go
scripts.setup:full: npm run setup:basic && npm run build:safe
scripts.build:safe: npm run build:go-safe && npm run build:js-safe
scripts.build:go-safe: go mod tidy && mkdir -p bin && go build -o bin/liv-viewer ./cmd/viewer || echo 'Go viewer build failed'
scripts.build:js-safe: npm run install:js && npm run build:js || echo 'JS build failed, skipping'
scripts.quick-start: npm run install:desktop && npm run start:desktop
scripts.simple-start: cd desktop && npm install && npm start
